description: System-assigned unique identifier for a fuel transaction record.
Date and time the fueling event occurred (transaction effective date).
Code for the fuel stock item or storage tank used; likely references inventory/tank. Confirm with SME.
Volume of fuel dispensed in this transaction; units per system configuration (e.g., gallons or liters).
Unit price of the fuel at the time of transaction, before taxes and fees.
Internal identifier of the vehicle or equipment that received fuel.
Classification of the fueled asset for reporting and business rules.
Meter reading at fueling (odometer or hour meter), used for usage tracking and efficiency; unit indicated by meter_type.
Secondary meter value recorded at fueling (e.g., hours when primary is miles); likely optional. Confirm with SME.
Tertiary meter value recorded at fueling; rarely used. Confirm with SME.
Username of the operator or clerk who dispensed or recorded the transaction.
Identifier or description of the fuel product dispensed; likely stored as a code. Confirm with SME.
Inventory movement type associated with the fuel transaction (issue, receipt, transfer). Confirm with SME.
Cost or general ledger account charged for this fuel transaction.
Inventory site or fuel storage location associated with the transaction. Confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the fueling event or data anomalies.
Tax percentage applied to the fuel price for this transaction.
Monetary amount of fuel tax calculated for this transaction.
Status flag indicating whether the transaction has been posted to inventory or accounting.
Reference key to the related inventory transaction record. Confirm with SME.
Date and time the inventory transaction was created or posted.
User-defined field for site-specific data; meaning configured by the organization.

User-defined field for site-specific data; meaning configured by the organization.
User-defined field for site-specific data; meaning configured by the organization.
User who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User who last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update.
Extended amount for the transaction (quantity Ã— unit price plus taxes or fees, if applicable).
Indicates how the transaction was added (manual entry, import, automated pump feed). Confirm with SME.
Identifier of the fueling site or specific pump used. Confirm with SME.
Method of fuel disbursement (bulk issue, card purchase, mobile tanker). Confirm with SME.
Distance since the previous fueling, derived from meter readings; units follow meter_type. Confirm with SME.
Fuel economy for the interval, calculated as distance per unit of fuel.
Previous recorded meter value used to compute distance and validate readings. Confirm with SME.
Unit of measure for meter readings (e.g., miles, kilometers, hours).
Document or sequence number of the associated inventory transaction. Confirm with SME.
Organizational unit responsible for the asset or fuel cost allocation.
